NetNewsWire 3.2 Beta

Posted to Mottr.am by Jack on 31 July 2009. Tagged nnw and rss.

Pros: Google Reader sync, in place of the godawful heap of poo that was Newsgator, which is to be taken outside and shot on August 31st. A nice ‘send to Instapaper’ feature. Cons: very distracting, flickering, brightly-coloured advertisements (a paid-for version is coming soon, though). Synchronisation is a wee bit flakey.
